title: F5 security advisory (AV26-086)
description: On February 4, 2026, F5 published security updates for multiple products. Included were updates for the following:
products: BIG-IP Container Ingress Services for Kubernetes and OpenShift  versions 2.0.0 to 2.20.1, versions 1.0.0 to 1.14.0
NGINX Gateway Fabric  versions 2.0.0 to 2.4.0, versions 1.2.0 to 1.6.2
NGINX Plus  versions R32 to R36 P1
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
